channel.title: Projects on Savinien Barbotaud

item.title: Netyparneo
item.description: Netyparneo Great project for ENSSAT ! Allowing university to manage their contracts with enterprises Get the source code and installation instruction here !
item.content:
Netyparneo

Great project for ENSSAT ! Allowing university to manage their contracts with enterprises

Get the source code and installation instruction here !

item.title: Openreplay
item.description: Openreplay contributor Openreplay is a log and sessions replay solution. The self-hosted solution could not be installed locally, with the docker-compose method. I change the docker-compose method to allow local installation of openreplay.
item.content:
Openreplay contributor

Openreplay is a log and sessions replay solution.

The self-hosted solution could not be installed locally, with the docker-compose method.

I change the docker-compose method to allow local installation of openreplay.

item.title: Project - Javabien
item.description: Javabien Java memory game ! turn over more cards than your opponent and win the game. Themes : Cats and airplane (All what I love). The source code is avaible here !
item.content:
Javabien

Java memory game !

turn over more cards than your opponent and win the game.

Themes : Cats and airplane (All what I love).

The source code is avaible here !

item.title: React Native
item.description: Apizee React Apirtc is a browser JS library, with Apizee, the goal was to adapt this library to Android ans iOS technologies. An example is publish on github, and the library is avaible on NPM website
item.content:
Apizee React

Apirtc is a browser JS library, with Apizee, the goal was to adapt this library to Android ans iOS technologies.

An example is publish on github, and the library is avaible on NPM website

item.title: SW Discord
item.description: Summoner war - Discord bot The bot I created is used to analyze a Summoner war game mode. He provide stats, when a user provide a specific JSON file. The code is available on github.
item.content:
Summoner war - Discord bot

The bot I created is used to analyze a Summoner war game mode.

He provide stats, when a user provide a specific JSON file.

The code is available on github.
